unemployed.title: You're Still You When You're Unemployed
unemployed.blurb: Hooley copes with unemployment by internalizing a perspective her therapist shared with her.

why_bang.title: Why I Use Exclamation Points With Myself!
why_bang.blurb: Hooley talks about her personal benefits of using exclamation points when taking notes for herself.

jp_and_julia.title: When the Internet Role Model Couple Breaks Up
jp_and_julia.blurb: Hooley discusses the surprising (albeit mild) emotional response to an internet breakup.
